title: Egg-free tuna Nicoise salad
ingredients: ['200g new potatoes', '2 tuna steaks', 'olive oil, for frying', 'salt and pepper', '150g green beans', '1 head lettuce (of your choice)', '200g cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 tin anchovies', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon English mustard']
